text: The 1983 Arkansas Razorbacks football team represented the University of Arkansas during the 1983 NCAA Division I-A football season. Ron Faurot received first-team All-American honors as a defensive lineman for the Hogs. The Hogs would hire Ken Hatfield, who shined for the Hogs as a defensive back on the 1964 national championship team, as their new head football coach."Arkansas Database." NCAA Database. National Champs.net. Retrieved on November 1, 2007. He is still a large proponent of the triple option offense in college football."Ken Hatfield." CSTV.com. Rice Owls Coach Profile.
